name: wasm-themis
description: Themis is a convenient cryptographic library for data protection.

scripts.test: find test -name *.js | sort | xargs -L1 ts-mocha -p tsconfig.json
scripts.tsc-cjs: tsc -t es6 -m commonjs --outDir dist && cp src/libthemis* src/.npmignore dist/
scripts.tsc-es6: tsc -t es6 -m es6 --outDir dist-es6 && cp src/libthemis* src/.npmignore dist-es6/
scripts.prepare: npm run tsc-cjs && npm run tsc-es6

author: Cossack Labs
